patch:
FILE: docs/.hooks/main.py

    return re.sub(
        r'
(\n\n(?:\d+\..+?\n)+?\n)?',

        markdown,

REPLACE:
    return re.sub(
        r'
(\n\n(?:\d+\..+?\n)+?\n)?',
        lambda m: transform_gateway_code_block(m, relative_path),
        markdown,
        flags=re.MULTILINE | re.DOTALL,
